message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $19,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $19,000 is a bit out of my range. I'm willing to pay $12,500 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value to me. Let me know what you think.
Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I could come down to $17,000. This offer reflects the true worth of the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $17,000 is still a bit high for my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, which is a fair compromise.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
